New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 12 月 24 日星期二 10:11:04 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Emergency services scramble to scene of serious crash between motorcycle and car in Tauranga https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/emergency-services-scramble-to-scene-of-serious-crash- Between-motorcycle-and-car-in-tauranga/V5REKGVUGVFQ5OJZ5DUCYQYB3A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/emergency-services-scramble-to-scene-of-serious-crash- Between-motorcycle-and-car-in-tauranga/V5REKGVUGVFQ5OJZ5DUCYQYB3A/ It's understood the crash involves a motorcycle and car. Tue, 24 Dec 2024 09:02:52 +0000 The crash happened on Lloyd St in Parkvale, Tauranga about 8.20pm. Photo / Google
Prime Minister Christopher Luxon shares festive photo of family Christmas Eve tradition, donning matching pyjamas https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/prime-minister-christopher-luxon-shares-festive-photo-of-family-christmas-eve-tradition-donning-matching-pyjamas/AFHEZXXALZFKPJ26SREJSKLF4Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/prime-minister-christopher-luxon-shares-festive-photo-of-family-christmas-eve-tradition-donning-matching-pyjamas/AFHEZXXALZFKPJ26SREJSKLF4Q/ The Luxons' holiday movie of choice in the past has been the classic Love Actually. Tue, 24 Dec 2024 08:08:34 +0000 Prime Minister Christopher Luxon, wife Amanda and children Olivia and William wear matching festive pyjamas on Christmas Eve, carrying on one of their relatively recent family traditions. Photo / Supplied
Man arrested, armed police surround New World Papakura after incident involving gunman https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-arrested-armed-police-surround-new-world-papakura-after-staff-threatened-by-armed-gunman/IOLYJ4BB2VE33O74BCH7G4GQDI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-arrested-armed-police-surround-new-world-papakura-after-staff-threatened-by-armed-gunman/IOLYJ4BB2VE33O74BCH7G4GQDI/ Witnesses reported seeing the gunman with a firearm inside the supermarket. Tue, 24 Dec 2024 06:48:30 +0000 Armed police swarmed New World Papakura and surrounding areas today, with witnesses reporting seeing a man armed with a firearm inside the supermarket. Photo / Google Maps
West Auckland shooting: Police manhunt for gunman continues after pair shot in Hobsonville https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/west-auckland-shooting-police-manhunt-for-gunman-continues-after-pair-shot-in-hobsonville/4LVSULXMBBBGNBXXTZCKKVLVGI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/west-auckland-shooting-police-manhunt-for-gunman-continues-after-pair-shot-in-hobsonville/4LVSULXMBBBGNBXXTZCKKVLVGI/ The pair remain in hospital after suffering serious injuries in the shooting. Tue, 24 Dec 2024 06:28:07 +0000 Police are continuing their hunt for a gunman after two people were shot on Memorial Park Lane in Hobsonville on Sunday night. Photo / Google Maps
Auckland mother of two young children devastated after freak cycling accident claims husband’s life at Stanley Point https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/our-rock-auckland-mother-of-two-young-children-devastated-after-freak-cycling-accident-claims-husbands-life/XR3NNQTRIJEXFOFKLQNHNAZVFA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/our-rock-auckland-mother-of-two-young-children-devastated-after-freak-cycling-accident-claims-husbands-life/XR3NNQTRIJEXFOFKLQNHNAZVFA/ Bernard OrsmanGemma Gordon has been widowed with two young children. Tue, 24 Dec 2024 05:07:35 +0000 Jack Gordon (right), who died following a cycling accident, with wife Gemma, Quinn, 4, and Mia, 6 months.
Police investigating attempted kidnapping in Northland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-investigating-attempted-kidnapping-in-northland/CQSM3OWPEFBVBDUVMJFYSU7KMM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-investigating-attempted-kidnapping-in-northland/CQSM3OWPEFBVBDUVMJFYSU7KMM/ A person has claimed they were forced into a car by an unknown group in Northland. Tue, 24 Dec 2024 04:44:54 +0000 Police are investigating an attempted abduction in Ohiwa. Photo / NZME
New search for Mt Cook missing climbers - ski pole located https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-search-for-mt-cook-missing-climbers-ski-pole- located/JHDCMGAZH5CFTDD52TD7NYEEWM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-search-for-mt-cook-missing-climbers-ski-pole- located/JHDCMGAZH5CFTDD52TD7NYEEWM/ Police have launched a new search for missing climbers. Tue, 24 Dec 2024 04:22:49 +0000 Kurt Blair, 56, and Carlos Romero, 50 are two of trio who went missing from Aoraki Mt Cook, South Island, December 2.
Two prisoners escape from custody at Waikato Hospital in one month https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/two-prisoners-escape-from-custody-at-waikato-hospital-in-one-month/MESZYCES3FFLHE4X4SA55YV2MU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/two-prisoners-escape-from-custody-at-waikato-hospital-in-one-month/MESZYCES3FFLHE4X4SA55YV2MU/ Georgina CampbellReviews are being undertaken into both incidents. Tue, 24 Dec 2024 04:17:16 +0000 Chloe Mather alleges a prisoner who escaped custody from Waitako Hospital on November 22 carjacked her vehicle and stole petrol before police spiked the car. Photo / Supplied by Cloe Mather
Escaped prisoner Damon Anderson walked through Waikato Hospital in underwear, uncuffed before absconding – witness https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/photo-shows-escaped-prisoner-shimmying-down-pipe-outside-waikato-hospital/AEPM6EH7TNERVGMX2QCG57SHNE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/photo-shows-escaped-prisoner-shimmying-down-pipe-outside-waikato-hospital/AEPM6EH7TNERVGMX2QCG57SHNE/ Benjamin PlummerThe video purportedly shows him sliding down from the eighth floor. Tue, 24 Dec 2024 04:00:32 +0000 Spring Hill prisoner Damon Anderson, 48, escaped from Waikato Hospital by shimmying down a pipe while in handcuffs.
Brent Mags’ garden project fosters food security and community in Gisborne https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/brent-mags-garden-project-fosters-food-security-and-community-in-gisborne/E73VDWXCK5GPVHIKQJASFFVYK4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/brent-mags-garden-project-fosters-food-security-and-community-in-gisborne/E73VDWXCK5GPVHIKQJASFFVYK4/ Matai O'Connor, Kaupapa Māori reporter'Share that kai': How team gardening boosts food security.
